reviewText: Please note that Katas is a Japanese term, whereas Tang Soo Do is a Korean martial art. I think this book is misleading. In Korea, forms are called Hyungs. I don't think I would waste my money on a book that doesn't even have the basics correct.

Yet another fraud! He claims over 250 black belt degrees including being a grandmaster in several. This should make it obvious what is going on. For more insight look at his Youtube videos for the complete lack of technical acumen in the most basic techniques. Please spend you hard earned dollars elsewhere or simply get to the dojang and train hard.

I'm sorry, but Korean "katas"??? Seriously? There is no such thing.
Korean = hyung or poomse
Japanese/Okinawan = kata

Master Aaron Locke
6th Dan - Tang Soo Do
5th Dan - Okinawan Goju-Ryu
